comment._content: the very first "luna park"! it would be nice to have some pictures about the inside, too!

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: The photo appears to have been taken from the southwest corner of the intersection of Surf Ave. and W. 12th Street in Coney Island. A housing project, slated for redevelopment, now sits on the site of the original Luna Park, and the Luna Park Furniture Corporation's building at 1017 Surf Ave. seems to coincide with the location of the original entrance. Here's link to a map of the original Luna Park: www.westland.net/coneyisland/mapsdocs/luna30map.htm This would place the coordinates of the photo as 40.57539389190821, -73.97968053817749. Link to apporoximate location of photographer of this photo at Google Maps: maps.google.com/maps?q=(40.57539389190821,+-73.9796805381...

comment.author: 67364004@N00
comment._content: what if we could have a satellite map of that time... i wonder what it will be like in the next 50 or more years to come, they will have so precise pictures of the past times
